item.title: Restaurant sign on the middle of the pavement., 20th June
item.description:
The Indian restaurant at 50 paddington st w1u 4hp called Rahul have placed a signboard outside of their restaurant on the middle of the pavement. This is on paddington which is a very busy street with a high footfall. I actually tripped over this signboard causing me injury. This signboard is a danger and a hazard especially when thus street is used by many elderly people and children and also people with buggies. This has been going on for over 6 months. I urge you to look at this as a matter of urgency and get this removed ASAP. THANKS

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Paddington Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
